lines: 1. Musi thongola i tshi wa u a i vhona-vho;
U funa zwothe zwinoni u funa na nne-vho.
U a mpfuna, U a mpfuna, U funa na nne-vho;
Na zwithu zwitukutuku U a zwi funa-vho.
2. U nakisa na maluvha a tshi tou fhefheda;
U funa othe maluvha, na nne u a mpfuna.
3. Mudzimu o sika zwothe, zwa fhano shangoni;
Vhana vhatuku ndi vhawe, na nne U a mpfuna.
